Text:
Thanks for the upload, I have enjoyed the game so far.  :)

Just one problem, am I the only one who cannot save it?  It will allow me to setup a profile and save, but when I leave the game and come back at a later time, all my info is lost and I have to start ALL over!!

It's only a demo. Played for about an hour and then was it over. The same as if you download them from Big Fish itself.
Does anyone have a cracked version??

thx
There is a precracked on mininova website
